name: Bomb The House
description:
Bombarders! Get ready🚀

🔸Mind-breaking fun levels🔸
Bomb physics-based cubes and have fun! Sometimes you will encounter puzzled levels made of physics cubes - solve them to move forward!

🔸Shooter🔸
You won't have guns but you will have bombs to destroy houses! All buildings are made of highly optimized physics based cubes which will give you smooth and fun experience. Walk on the plane freely and aim to throw bombs into the target

🔸Bomb bomb bomb!🔸
Throw the bomb and try to hit into a hot place and destroy the building as best as you can. Bomb roofs, walls and ceilings!

🔸Target🔸
Bomb the building to get points and be the first in leaderboard. The more you have destroyed cubes in level the more points you will have. Solve more mind-breaking levels to earn a leading bombarder leaderboard place. Try to bomb your best!

🔸Different Bombs🔸
There is currently 4 kinds of bombs in the game and each of them has different abilities. Try to bomb and destroy with each one! Feel exciting, FUN emotions!

🔸Languages🔸
The game have been translated into more than 10 languages. Enjoy!

Try to unlock all levels. All levels are SOLVABLE!
